meanings.definition: People who perform tricks to deceive the senses.
meanings.sent1: The illusionists amazed the audience with their magic tricks.
meanings.sent2: The illusionists were skilled at creating optical illusions.
meanings.sent3: The illusionists made it seem like objects were disappearing into thin air.
meanings.sent4: The illusionists were like wizards, casting spells of wonder and disbelief.
meanings.sent5: The illusionists' performance was so captivating, it felt like stepping into a dream.

meanings.sent1: The illusionists used mirrors to create stunning optical illusions.
meanings.sent2: Audiences were left in awe of the illusionists' optical tricks.
meanings.sent3: The illusionists' optical illusions were so convincing, they seemed like real magic.
meanings.sent4: The illusionists' mastery of optical illusions was truly mind-bending.
meanings.sent5: Watching the illusionists' optical illusions was like entering a world of fantasy.

meanings.definition: Artists who specialize in creating illusions.
meanings.sent1: The illusionists painted breathtaking illusions on canvas.
meanings.sent2: Art galleries showcased the works of talented illusionists.
meanings.sent3: The illusionists' illusions were so realistic, they fooled even the experts.
meanings.sent4: The illusionists' artistry in creating illusions was unparalleled.
meanings.sent5: Visiting the illusionists' exhibition felt like stepping into a world of make-believe.
